```{r}
params$growth_data |> 
  tibble::as_tibble() |> 
  dplyr::mutate(`Data nasc.` = as.Date(`Data nasc.`)) |>
  ggplot2::ggplot(ggplot2::aes(x = `Data nasc.`, y = `Peso (kg)`)) +
  ggplot2::geom_point() +
  ggplot2::geom_line() +
  ggplot2::labs(title = "Crescimento", 
                x = "Data", 
                y = "Peso (kg)") +
  ggplot2::theme_bw()
```

```{r}

params$growth_data |> 
  tibble::as_tibble() |>
  dplyr::mutate(gmd = (`Peso (kg)` - `Peso Nasc. (kg)`) / 30) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
